document_data.name: Sand shroud
document_data.mainbody: '''''Sand shroud''''' was a [[spell]] used by wizards in [[Anauroch]] and [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.
document_data.Effects: With this spell the caster could open up an area of [[sand]] directly beneath a target and swallow them whole. This spell only worked over sand or loose earth. Only the dead, [[undead]], or creatures that never lived, such as [[golem]]s, could be targets of this spell. If cast successfully, this spell buried the target {{SI|60|ft|long=yes}} under the sand and covered them up as if nothing happened.
document_data.Components: This spell required a lump of mud, clay, dried [[dung]], or other powdery substance to cast.
